Title: Wayward Tools
Description:
This is terrible! My *hic* tools seem to have run off when I wasn't looking. I can't *hic* stand the thought of them all alone out there, no doubt scared out of their minds!

Would you round them up for me? Just be patient and *hic* try to soothe their nerves and I'm sure they'll warm right up to you!
RewardText: Thank you, $n! I'll *hic* always remember your heroism!
